FactTemplateWizard, NewAssetWizard, NewPackageWizard, ValidationMessageWidget
public class FormStylePopup
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PopupPanel

This builds on the FormStyleLayout for providing common popup features in a columnar form layout, with a title and a large (ish) icon.
